summary: A home lost in time for the Dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2676350-1369168313.jpg[/img]

[color=Goldenrod] [size=5]Main Features[/size][/color]

A quiet home for the Dragonborn away from the stresses of Skyrim, situated in a windy, desolate, frozen valley.

[color=Goldenrod] [size=5]Update (v1.0)[/size][/color]

-->Initial Release

[size=5][color=Goldenrod]Installation[/color][/size]

[color=red]Skyrim must be updated to the latest patch[/color]

[color=red]Requires Dragonborn[/color]

Via NMM or Mod Organizer: Everything follows the basic procedure for all files.
Manually: Again, follow standard procedure for all files: drop the main file and the loose folders.

[color=red] [size=5]Warnings/Troubleshooting/Things to Know[/size][/color]

-->The door in the basement leads to a temporary cell. This can be used for any future expansions. The mod itself is very simple, so you could very easily make your own additions with the CK (if you do and want to share, please let me know).

[color=Goldenrod] [size=5]Recommended Mods[/size][/color]

[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22745] Footprints [/url]


By [color=Goldenrod]BWchief117 (or bw117)[/color]
[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/users/2676350?tab=user+files] [img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2676350-1386747147.jpg[/img] [/url]
author: BW117
